publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2642 Mr Frank McAveety: The Panels of Persons to Safeguard the Interests of Children (Scotland) Regulations 2001-That the Education, Culture and Sport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Panels of Persons to Safeguard the Interests of Children (Scotland) Regulations 2001 (SSI 2001/476). Supported by: Jackie Baillie*

S1M-2642 Mr Frank McAveety: The Panels of Persons to Safeguard the Interests of Children (Scotland) Regulations 2001-That the Education, Culture and Sport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Panels of Persons to Safeguard the Interests of Children (Scotland) Regulations 2001 (SSI 2001/476). Supported by: Jackie Baillie
